thread.title: Jennifer Lopez celebrates her twins’ 9th birthday with ex-husband Marc Anthony
thread.title_full: Jennifer Lopez celebrates her twins’ 9th birthday with ex-husband Marc Anthony

author: Yinka Agunbiade
title: Jennifer Lopez celebrates her twins’ 9th birthday with ex-husband Marc Anthony
text:
Yinka Agunbiade February 23, 2017 
Jennifer Lopez reunited with her ex-husband Marc Anthony on Monday to celebrate their twins’ birthday. 
The 47-year-old singer and 48-year-old Latin music star rang in son Max and daughter Emme’s 9th birthday with the kids’ godmother, actress Leah Remini, her husband, actor Angelo Pagan, and other friends. 
“Celebrating our Max & Emme’s 9th birthday @jlo @marcanthony @therealangelopagan #familia #memories #friendship,” Remini captioned a photo of herself with Lopez, Anthony and Pagan on Instagram. A post shared by Leah Remini (@leahremini) on Feb 20, 2017 at 6:46pm PST 
Max and Emme officially turn 9 years old on Wednesday. Lopez said in an interview with People and Entertainment Weekly in March 2016 that her children inspired her 2011 hit single “On the Floor.” 
“I had given birth and the kids honestly just gave me a new direction,” the star shared through tears. 
“They just made me realise, like, what was real and what wasn’t real,” she added. “They just changed everything.” A post shared by Jennifer Lopez (@jlo) on Feb 17, 2017 at 3:17am PST 
Lopez and Anthony split in 2011 after seven years of marriage, but have remained close friends since. The “I Luh Ya Papi” singer was last linked to rapper Drake, but confirmed she’s single on Monday’s episode of The Ellen DeGeneres Show . Recommended for you
